typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		LEDGER_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		ALTACCT as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		FUND_CODE as string,
		CLASS_FLD as string,
		PROGRAM_CODE as string,
		BUDGET_REF as string,
		AFFILIATE as string,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA1 as string,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA2 as string,
		CHARTFIELD1 as string,
		CHARTFIELD2 as string,
		CHARTFIELD3 as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		BOOK_CODE as string,
		GL_ADJUST_TYPE as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		STATISTICS_CODE as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		POSTED_AMT_RC as decimal(18,0),
		POSTED_AMT_FC as decimal(18,0),
		POSTED_AMT_TC as decimal(18,0),
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		DTTM_STAMP_SEC as timestamp,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as decimal(18,0),
		LOAD_DTTM as timestamp,
		LASTUPDDTTM as timestamp,
		ERROR_FLAG as string,
		DBXCONCATCOL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> GlBalanceSTG
source(output(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		LEDGER_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		ALTACCT as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		FUND_CODE as string,
		CLASS_FLD as string,
		PROGRAM_CODE as string,
		BUDGET_REF as string,
		AFFILIATE as string,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA1 as string,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA2 as string,
		CHARTFIELD1 as string,
		CHARTFIELD2 as string,
		CHARTFIELD3 as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		BOOK_CODE as string,
		GL_ADJUST_TYPE as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		STATISTICS_CODE as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		POSTED_AMT_RC as decimal(18,0),
		POSTED_AMT_FC as decimal(18,0),
		POSTED_AMT_TC as decimal(18,0),
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		DTTM_STAMP_SEC as timestamp,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as decimal(18,0),
		LOAD_DTTM as timestamp,
		LASTUPDDTTM as timestamp,
		ERROR_FLAG as string,
		DBXCONCATCOL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> GlBanceSTG1
GlBalanceSTG aggregate(groupBy(ENTITY_ID,
		LEDGER_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		BRANCH_ID,
		PRODUCT,
		AFFILIATE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD),
	POSTED_AMT_TC = sum(toDouble(POSTED_AMT_TC)),
		POSTED_AMT_FC = sum(toDouble(POSTED_AMT_FC)),
		POSTED_AMT_RC = sum(toDouble(POSTED_AMT_RC))) ~> Aggregate1
GlBanceSTG1 select(mapColumn(
		ALTACCT,
		FUND_CODE,
		CLASS_FLD,
		PROGRAM_CODE,
		BUDGET_REF,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA1,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA2,
		CHARTFIELD1,
		CHARTFIELD2,
		CHARTFIELD3,
		PROJECT_ID,
		BOOK_CODE,
		GL_ADJUST_TYPE,
		STATISTICS_CODE,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		DTTM_STAMP_SEC,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE,
		LOAD_DTTM,
		LASTUPDDTTM,
		ERROR_FLAG,
		DBXCONCATCOL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Aggregate1, Select1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 sink(input(
		ENTITY_ID as string,
		LEDGER_ID as string,
		ACCOUNT_ID as string,
		ALTACCT as string,
		ORG_UNIT_ID as string,
		BRANCH_ID as string,
		PRODUCT as string,
		FUND_CODE as string,
		CLASS_FLD as string,
		PROGRAM_CODE as string,
		BUDGET_REF as string,
		AFFILIATE as string,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA1 as string,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA2 as string,
		CHARTFIELD1 as string,
		CHARTFIELD2 as string,
		CHARTFIELD3 as string,
		PROJECT_ID as string,
		BOOK_CODE as string,
		GL_ADJUST_TYPE as string,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC as string,
		STATISTICS_CODE as string,
		FISCAL_YEAR as integer,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD as integer,
		POSTED_AMT_RC as decimal(18,0),
		POSTED_AMT_FC as decimal(18,0),
		POSTED_AMT_TC as decimal(18,0),
		CURRENCY_CD_FC as string,
		DTTM_STAMP_SEC as timestamp,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE as decimal(18,0),
		LOAD_DTTM as timestamp,
		LASTUPDDTTM as timestamp,
		ERROR_FLAG as string,
		DBXCONCATCOL as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		ENTITY_ID,
		LEDGER_ID,
		ACCOUNT_ID,
		ALTACCT,
		ORG_UNIT_ID,
		BRANCH_ID,
		PRODUCT,
		FUND_CODE,
		CLASS_FLD,
		PROGRAM_CODE,
		BUDGET_REF,
		AFFILIATE,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA1,
		AFFILIATE_INTRA2,
		CHARTFIELD1,
		CHARTFIELD2,
		CHARTFIELD3,
		PROJECT_ID,
		BOOK_CODE,
		GL_ADJUST_TYPE,
		CURRENCY_CD_TC,
		STATISTICS_CODE,
		FISCAL_YEAR,
		ACCOUNTING_PERIOD,
		POSTED_AMT_RC,
		POSTED_AMT_FC,
		POSTED_AMT_TC,
		CURRENCY_CD_FC,
		DTTM_STAMP_SEC,
		PROCESS_INSTANCE,
		LOAD_DTTM,
		LASTUPDDTTM,
		ERROR_FLAG,
		DBXCONCATCOL
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
